mapper.select: select max(seq) as seq from T_CM_APLY_CAMP

select seq, aply_tot_amt, aply_prgrs, aply_dt, aply_name, jikbun_se, church_adtr, church_addr,church,church_se, church_dtl_addr, schdl_se, phone, email, checkbox, full_address, detail_address, join_his_se, rgtr_nm, rgtr_dt, updt_nm, updt_dt, kakao_email, pyr_nm, checkbox_use_room, bank_nm, kakao_id, memo, nvl((select sum(brochure_cnt) from T_CM_APLY_POSTER where email = T_CM_APLY_CAMP.email),0) as brochure_cnt, nvl((select sum(poster_cnt) from T_CM_APLY_POSTER where email = T_CM_APLY_CAMP.email),0) as poster_cnt from T_CM_APLY_CAMP where delyn='N'

select seq, aply_tot_amt, aply_prgrs, aply_dt, aply_name, jikbun_se, church_adtr, church_addr,church,church_se, church_dtl_addr, schdl_se, phone, email, checkbox, full_address, detail_address, join_his_se, rgtr_nm, rgtr_dt, updt_nm, updt_dt, kakao_email, pyr_nm, checkbox_use_room, bank_nm, kakao_id, memo from T_CM_APLY_CAMP where kakao_id = #{kakaoId}
select seq, chodeung, cheongsonyeon, cheongnyeon, jangnyeon, sayeogja from T_CM_CAMP_CNT

select seq, aply_tot_amt, aply_prgrs, aply_dt, aply_name, jikbun_se, church_adtr, church_addr,church,church_se, church_dtl_addr, schdl_se, phone, email, checkbox, full_address, detail_address, join_his_se, rgtr_nm, rgtr_dt, updt_nm, updt_dt, kakao_email, pyr_nm, checkbox_use_room, bank_nm, kakao_id, memo, ( select concat('초등:',chodeung,'명 ', '청소년:',cheongsonyeon,'명 ', '청년:',cheongnyeon,'명 ', '장년:',jangnyeon,'명 ', '사역자:',sayeogja,'명') from T_CM_CAMP_CNT where seq = T_CM_APLY_CAMP.seq) as CAMP_CNT from T_CM_APLY_CAMP where kakao_id = #{kakaoId}
select seq, path from T_CM_JOIN_PATH_SE where seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CM_JOIN_PATH_SE ( seq, path ) values (#{seq}, #{path})
insert into T_CM_CAMP_CNT (seq, chodeung, cheongsonyeon, cheongnyeon, jangnyeon, sayeogja) values(#{seq}, #{chodeung}, #{cheongsonyeon}, #{cheongnyeon}, #{jangnyeon}, #{sayeogja})

insert into T_CM_APLY_POSTER( aply_name, email, brochure_cnt, poster_cnt, church, addr, dtl_addr, phone ) values( #{aplyName}, #{email}, #{brochureCnt}, #{posterCnt}, #{church}, #{addr}, #{dtlAddr}, #{phone} )
mapper.update: update T_CM_APLY_CAMP set aply_name = #{aplyName}, jikbun_se = #{jikbunSe}, church_adtr = #{churchAdtr}, church_addr = #{churchAddr}, church = #{church}, church_se = #{churchSe}, church_dtl_addr = #{churchDtlAddr}, schdl_se = #{schdlSe}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, full_address = #{fullAddress}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, pyr_nm = #{pyrNm}, bank_nm = #{bankNm}, memo = #{memo} where seq = #{seq}
update T_CM_CAMP_CNT set chodeung = #{chodeung}, cheongsonyeon = #{cheongsonyeon}, cheongnyeon = #{cheongnyeon}, jangnyeon = #{jangnyeon}, sayeogja = #{sayeogja} where seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: update T_CM_APLY_CAMP set delyn = 'Y' where seq = #{seq}
